item.description:
It's time for another Kaffeklatsch! Please have a tea, coffee, sandwich or pastry with us and practice speaking German. Whether you learned Geman in Germany, in school, or on your own, you are welcome.
Bitte, komm mal vorbei!
Perhaps some of us will talk about the film Emma's Gluck dass wir diese Woche gesehen haben. Do you know of other German films zu empfehlen?
Many people don't RSVP, so there are usually many more people than shown here. We have representatives from many different countries. Bis dann!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the flags of Austria, Germany,Switzerland,Liechtenstein
item.name: First Thursday Kaffeeklatsch
